file_content.text: I have recorded your path in the annals of the Jedi Order. May the Force be with you.
Speak with Master Dynaroth. Choose your path wisely.
Your Master told me you displayed great potential on Tython. But the trials of a Padawan will not define you.
Jedi departing Tython have always chosen a path. I became a keeper of knowledge. Others became tacticians or pursued the true diplomatic arts.
But these are not paths I foresee for you.
Your strengths suggest two paths. You could devote yourself to the healing techniques of the Force, the defense of the weak.
Or you could join the secret arm of the Jedi Order. Such followers use the Force to evade detection and defend the Republic covertly.
When you are ready, Master Dynaroth will draw this phase of your training to a close.
Your guidance has proven invaluable, Master Ostar-Gal.
Thank you.
It's the least I can do for Yuon Par's apprentice.
Can you offer me a final word of guidance?
Any advice?
The archives speak of great Jedi who shaped the galaxy for the better. Whatever your decision, aspire to their example.
Now go forth. Choose your path within the Force, and make your Master proud.
History watches you, young Jedi.
I can't be bothered with more training. Not now.
I don't have time for this.
Make time. For your Master. For your future as a Jedi.
At last we speak. I am Master Ostar-Gal, keeper of the Jedi Archives and a close friend of your Master.
What do you mean, Master?
Please, continue.
I would hope not.
